Abilene.Holland Medical High School: Holland Medical High School is a public health sciences magnet school within Abilene Independent School District in Abilene, Texas. It is located at 2442 Cedar Street on the campus of Hardin-Simmons University directly across the street from the sprawling Hendrick Medical Center. The school was proposed in 2005 to be the first "school of choice" within AISD, giving the district's growing Health Occupations programs space to grow and expand.
